Uses of Class
Screen

  • Uses of Screen in <Unnamed>

    Subclasses of Screen in <Unnamed>
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DrawingMode
    Serves to act as the draw feature for the class which is an interactive tool allowing the user to draw on a white board with six color options Has an DrawingSurface, Menu and other variables allowing for control switches Does the drawing, interprets mouse interactions, and changes drawing controls
    class 
    Instructions
    Creates a pop out window with instructions.
    class 
    Introduction
    Serves to display the title/introduction display
    class 
    Menu
    Serves to act as a menu where the user can navigate to different Screen within the game Screens include Instructions, QuizMode, StudyMode, and DrawingMode
    class 
    QuizMode
    Creates multiple choice questions for the user to interact with in order to learn fun and fast facts about each country.
    class 
    Settings
    Serves to act as a menu where the user can navigate to different Screens within the game Screens include Instructions, Quiz Mode, Study Mode, and Drawing Mode
    class 
    StudyMode
    A study mode where users directly interact with information from the map
